data.title: Fast Lane Spike Timing Outplay + Retake Stuns
data.description: Here are two great Retake stuns for A Site, alongside a way to catch the enemy team off guard while they are planting the Spike on A Site.

data.title: B Site Delay Setups from B Link and B Tower
data.description: From either the bottom of B Link, or B Tower - here are two ways that you can delay the enemy team's push into B Site.
